actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

actions.in_subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire and to convey certain lands or interests in lands to improve the management, protection, and administration of Colonial National Historical Park and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to: (1) grant perpetual easements or a fee simple interest in land to York County, Virginia, for rights-of-way on Colonial National Historical Park lands for the purpose of operating sewage-disposal systems; and (2) acquire specified lands to be included within the boundaries of the Park. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to acquire and to convey certain lands or interests in lands to improve the management, protection, and administration of Colonial National Historical Park and for other purposes.
